creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: necklace made from solid silver ring; circular center with possible sun design; fish scale pattern radiating from center; diamond shape pattern created by beating the silver in certain locations; solid silver pieces finished with elaborate spirals at both ends; connecting piece is separate and wrapped in braided silver wire; two rings connect these two separate pieces to form a complete circle; designs are present on both sides
title: Necklace
